function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"GBNs penetrating cell membrane for physical disruption and rupture","Impact":"Increased risk of bacterial cell damage and potential spread of contamination","Mitigation":"Use of nanosheets with modified sharp edges to reduce physical disruption","Technologies":"Nanotechnology for modifying GBNs","People":"Laboratory researchers, medical professionals","Owner":"Researchers, nanotechnology experts"},{"Description":"Oxidative stress mechanism generating ROS and damaging macromolecules of microorganisms","Impact":"Potential inactivation of viruses and damage to microorganism structures","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling ROS levels in the environment","Technologies":"Oxidative stress monitoring and mitigation systems","People":"Laboratory researchers, medical professionals","Owner":"Researchers, environmental health experts"},{"Description":"Unclear effect of physicochemical features of GBNs on antibacterial activity","Impact":"Potential variations in antibacterial effectiveness of GBNs","Mitigation":"Comprehensive testing and standardization of GBNs' physicochemical properties","Technologies":"Advanced material characterization and testing methods","People":"Material scientists, researchers, medical professionals","Owner":"Material scientists, research institutions"}]}
